sqlMap.select:
select id, order_sn, goodid, good_price, num, member_id, receiver, area_id, area_name, detailed_address, longitude, latitude, store_id, mobile, reply_mobile, order_status, audit_status, order_amount, promotional_discount, coupon_discount, integration_discount, use_integration, adjust_amount, rx_img_url, create_dt, source, remark, cancel_remark, update_user, update_dt, order_id, freight, cancel_dt, is_end from rx_t_reserve_order
order by $orderByClause$

select id, order_sn, goodid, good_price, num, member_id, receiver, area_id, area_name, detailed_address, longitude, latitude, store_id, mobile, reply_mobile, order_status, audit_status, order_amount, promotional_discount, coupon_discount, integration_discount, use_integration, adjust_amount, rx_img_url, create_dt, source, remark, cancel_remark, update_user, update_dt, order_id, freight, cancel_dt, is_end from rx_t_reserve_order where id = #id:BIGINT#
sqlMap.insert:
insert into rx_t_reserve_order (id, order_sn, goodid, good_price, num, member_id, receiver, area_id, area_name, detailed_address, longitude, latitude, store_id, mobile, reply_mobile, order_status, audit_status, order_amount, promotional_discount, coupon_discount, integration_discount, use_integration, adjust_amount, rx_img_url, create_dt, source, remark, cancel_remark, update_user, update_dt, order_id, freight, cancel_dt, is_end) values (#id:BIGINT#, #orderSn:VARCHAR#, #goodid:BIGINT#, #goodPrice:DECIMAL#, #num:INTEGER#, #memberId:BIGINT#, #receiver:VARCHAR#, #areaId:BIGINT#, #areaName:VARCHAR#, #detailedAddress:VARCHAR#, #longitude:VARCHAR#, #latitude:VARCHAR#, #storeId:VARCHAR#, #mobile:VARCHAR#, #replyMobile:VARCHAR#, #orderStatus:INTEGER#, #auditStatus:INTEGER#, #orderAmount:DECIMAL#, #promotionalDiscount:DECIMAL#, #couponDiscount:DECIMAL#, #integrationDiscount:DECIMAL#, #useIntegration:INTEGER#, #adjustAmount:DECIMAL#, #rxImgUrl:VARCHAR#, #createDt:TIMESTAMP#, #source:INTEGER#, #remark:VARCHAR#, #cancelRemark:VARCHAR#, #updateUser:VARCHAR#, #updateDt:TIMESTAMP#, #orderId:BIGINT#, #freight:DECIMAL#, #cancelDt:TIMESTAMP#, #isEnd:INTEGER#)
select LAST_INSERT_ID()

sqlMap.update:
update rx_t_reserve_order
id = #record.id:BIGINT#
order_sn = #record.orderSn:VARCHAR#
goodid = #record.goodid:BIGINT#
good_price = #record.goodPrice:DECIMAL#
num = #record.num:INTEGER#
member_id = #record.memberId:BIGINT#
receiver = #record.receiver:VARCHAR#
area_id = #record.areaId:BIGINT#
area_name = #record.areaName:VARCHAR#
detailed_address = #record.detailedAddress:VARCHAR#
longitude = #record.longitude:VARCHAR#
latitude = #record.latitude:VARCHAR#
store_id = #record.storeId:VARCHAR#
mobile = #record.mobile:VARCHAR#
reply_mobile = #record.replyMobile:VARCHAR#
order_status = #record.orderStatus:INTEGER#
audit_status = #record.auditStatus:INTEGER#
order_amount = #record.orderAmount:DECIMAL#
promotional_discount = #record.promotionalDiscount:DECIMAL#
coupon_discount = #record.couponDiscount:DECIMAL#
integration_discount = #record.integrationDiscount:DECIMAL#
use_integration = #record.useIntegration:INTEGER#
adjust_amount = #record.adjustAmount:DECIMAL#
rx_img_url = #record.rxImgUrl:VARCHAR#
create_dt = #record.createDt:TIMESTAMP#
source = #record.source:INTEGER#
remark = #record.remark:VARCHAR#
cancel_remark = #record.cancelRemark:VARCHAR#
update_user = #record.updateUser:VARCHAR#
update_dt = #record.updateDt:TIMESTAMP#
order_id = #record.orderId:BIGINT#
freight = #record.freight:DECIMAL#
cancel_dt = #record.cancelDt:TIMESTAMP#
is_end = #record.isEnd:INTEGER#

update rx_t_reserve_order set id = #record.id:BIGINT#, order_sn = #record.orderSn:VARCHAR#, goodid = #record.goodid:BIGINT#, good_price = #record.goodPrice:DECIMAL#, num = #record.num:INTEGER#, member_id = #record.memberId:BIGINT#, receiver = #record.receiver:VARCHAR#, area_id = #record.areaId:BIGINT#, area_name = #record.areaName:VARCHAR#, detailed_address = #record.detailedAddress:VARCHAR#, longitude = #record.longitude:VARCHAR#, latitude = #record.latitude:VARCHAR#, store_id = #record.storeId:VARCHAR#, mobile = #record.mobile:VARCHAR#, reply_mobile = #record.replyMobile:VARCHAR#, order_status = #record.orderStatus:INTEGER#, audit_status = #record.auditStatus:INTEGER#, order_amount = #record.orderAmount:DECIMAL#, promotional_discount = #record.promotionalDiscount:DECIMAL#, coupon_discount = #record.couponDiscount:DECIMAL#, integration_discount = #record.integrationDiscount:DECIMAL#, use_integration = #record.useIntegration:INTEGER#, adjust_amount = #record.adjustAmount:DECIMAL#, rx_img_url = #record.rxImgUrl:VARCHAR#, create_dt = #record.createDt:TIMESTAMP#, source = #record.source:INTEGER#, remark = #record.remark:VARCHAR#, cancel_remark = #record.cancelRemark:VARCHAR#, update_user = #record.updateUser:VARCHAR#, update_dt = #record.updateDt:TIMESTAMP#, order_id = #record.orderId:BIGINT#, freight = #record.freight:DECIMAL#, cancel_dt = #record.cancelDt:TIMESTAMP#, is_end = #record.isEnd:INTEGER#

update rx_t_reserve_order
order_sn = #orderSn:VARCHAR#
goodid = #goodid:BIGINT#
good_price = #goodPrice:DECIMAL#
num = #num:INTEGER#
member_id = #memberId:BIGINT#
receiver = #receiver:VARCHAR#
area_id = #areaId:BIGINT#
area_name = #areaName:VARCHAR#
detailed_address = #detailedAddress:VARCHAR#
longitude = #longitude:VARCHAR#
latitude = #latitude:VARCHAR#
store_id = #storeId:VARCHAR#
mobile = #mobile:VARCHAR#
reply_mobile = #replyMobile:VARCHAR#
order_status = #orderStatus:INTEGER#
audit_status = #auditStatus:INTEGER#
order_amount = #orderAmount:DECIMAL#
promotional_discount = #promotionalDiscount:DECIMAL#
coupon_discount = #couponDiscount:DECIMAL#
integration_discount = #integrationDiscount:DECIMAL#
use_integration = #useIntegration:INTEGER#
adjust_amount = #adjustAmount:DECIMAL#
rx_img_url = #rxImgUrl:VARCHAR#
create_dt = #createDt:TIMESTAMP#
source = #source:INTEGER#
remark = #remark:VARCHAR#
cancel_remark = #cancelRemark:VARCHAR#
update_user = #updateUser:VARCHAR#
update_dt = #updateDt:TIMESTAMP#
order_id = #orderId:BIGINT#
freight = #freight:DECIMAL#
cancel_dt = #cancelDt:TIMESTAMP#
is_end = #isEnd:INTEGER#
where id = #id:BIGINT#

update rx_t_reserve_order set order_sn = #orderSn:VARCHAR#, goodid = #goodid:BIGINT#, good_price = #goodPrice:DECIMAL#, num = #num:INTEGER#, member_id = #memberId:BIGINT#, receiver = #receiver:VARCHAR#, area_id = #areaId:BIGINT#, area_name = #areaName:VARCHAR#, detailed_address = #detailedAddress:VARCHAR#, longitude = #longitude:VARCHAR#, latitude = #latitude:VARCHAR#, store_id = #storeId:VARCHAR#, mobile = #mobile:VARCHAR#, reply_mobile = #replyMobile:VARCHAR#, order_status = #orderStatus:INTEGER#, audit_status = #auditStatus:INTEGER#, order_amount = #orderAmount:DECIMAL#, promotional_discount = #promotionalDiscount:DECIMAL#, coupon_discount = #couponDiscount:DECIMAL#, integration_discount = #integrationDiscount:DECIMAL#, use_integration = #useIntegration:INTEGER#, adjust_amount = #adjustAmount:DECIMAL#, rx_img_url = #rxImgUrl:VARCHAR#, create_dt = #createDt:TIMESTAMP#, source = #source:INTEGER#, remark = #remark:VARCHAR#, cancel_remark = #cancelRemark:VARCHAR#, update_user = #updateUser:VARCHAR#, update_dt = #updateDt:TIMESTAMP#, order_id = #orderId:BIGINT#, freight = #freight:DECIMAL#, cancel_dt = #cancelDt:TIMESTAMP#, is_end = #isEnd:INTEGER# where id = #id:BIGINT#
sqlMap.select:
select id, order_sn, goodid, good_price, num, member_id, receiver, area_id, area_name, detailed_address, longitude, latitude, store_id, mobile, reply_mobile, order_status, audit_status, order_amount, promotional_discount, coupon_discount, integration_discount, use_integration, adjust_amount, rx_img_url, create_dt, source, remark, cancel_remark, update_user, update_dt, order_id, freight, cancel_dt, is_end from rx_t_reserve_order
order by $orderByClause$
limit $pageInfo.start$ ,$pageInfo.pageSize$

SELECT t2.member_id, t2.noend, IF ( t3.quxiao IS NULL, 0, t3.quxiao ) quxiao, IF ( t5.shenhe IS NULL, 0, t5.shenhe ) shenhe, t2.createdt, t2.id, t4.user_name, t7.real_name, t4.mobile FROM ( SELECT COUNT(t.member_id) noend, t.member_id, MAX(t.create_dt) createdt, MAX(t.id) id FROM rx_t_reserve_order t WHERE t.is_end = 0 GROUP BY t.member_id ) t2 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(t.member_id) quxiao, t.member_id FROM rx_t_reserve_order t WHERE t.is_end = 0 AND t.order_status = 9 GROUP BY t.member_id ) t3 ON t2.member_id = t3.member_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(t.member_id) shenhe, t.member_id FROM rx_t_reserve_order t WHERE t.is_end = 0 AND t.audit_status=1 GROUP BY t.member_id ) t5 ON t2.member_id=t5.member_id LEFT JOIN t_member t4 ON t2.member_id = t4.id LEFT JOIN t_member_base_message_ext t7 ON t2.member_id = t7.member_id where 1=1
t4.user_name like '%$username$%'
t4.real_name like '%$realname$%'
t4.mobile like '%$mobile$%'
order by t2.createdt LIMIT $pageInfo.start$,$pageInfo.end$

SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT COUNT(t.member_id) noend, t.member_id, MAX(t.create_dt) createdt, MAX(t.id) id FROM rx_t_reserve_order t WHERE t.is_end = 0 GROUP BY t.member_id ) t2 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(t.member_id) quxiao, t.member_id FROM rx_t_reserve_order t WHERE t.is_end = 0 AND t.order_status = 9 GROUP BY t.member_id ) t3 ON t2.member_id = t3.member_id LEFT JOIN t_member t4 ON t2.member_id = t4.id LEFT JOIN t_member_base_message_ext t7 ON t2.member_id = t7.member_id where 1=1
t4.user_name like '%$username$%'
t7.real_name like '%$realname$%'
t4.mobile like '%$mobile$%'
order by t2.createdt

SELECT t1.goods_name, t1.spec, t1.abbreviation_picture, t2.order_sn, t1.goodsno, t.* FROM rx_t_reserve_order t LEFT JOIN t_goods t1 ON t.goodid = t1.id LEFT JOIN rx_t_order t2 ON t.order_id = t2.id where t.is_end = 0 and t.member_id = $memberId$ ORDER BY t.create_dt
SELECT MIN(t.freight) as freight, sum(t.good_price * t.num) price, MIN(t.freight)+sum(t.good_price * t.num) yf_price FROM rx_t_reserve_order t where t.id in($orderIds$)
SELECT * FROM rx_t_reserve_order t where t.id in($orderIds$)
SELECT t.goodid, COUNT(t.goodid) goodidsum, MAX(t.good_price) goodprice FROM rx_t_reserve_order t where t.id in($orderIds$) GROUP BY t.goodid HAVING COUNT(t.goodid)>1
SELECT * FROM rx_t_reserve_order t where t.id in($orderIds$) and t.goodid =$goodid$ and t.good_price != $good_price$

SELECT m.id,m.user_name,g.short_name,r.id as rid,r.good_price,r.num,(r.good_price*r.num) as order_amount,r.cancel_remark,r.audit_status,r.order_status,r.create_dt,r.receiver,r.mobile,r.is_end FROM rx_t_reserve_order r LEFT JOIN t_member m on r.member_id=m.id LEFT JOIN t_goods g on r.goodid=g.id where 1=1
m.user_name like '%$user_name$%'
r.receiver like '%$receiver$%'
r.mobile like '%$mobile$%'
r.audit_status = $audit_status$
r.order_status = $order_status$
ORDER BY r.create_dt desc
LIMIT $pageInfo.start$,$pageInfo.end$

SELECT count(r.id) FROM rx_t_reserve_order r LEFT JOIN t_member m on r.member_id=m.id LEFT JOIN t_goods g on r.goodid=g.id where 1=1
m.user_name like '%$user_name$%'
r.receiver like '%$receiver$%'
r.mobile like '%$mobile$%'
r.audit_status = $audit_status$
r.order_status = $order_status$

SELECT r.order_sn,m.id,m.user_name,g.short_name,r.id,r.good_price,r.num,(r.good_price*r.num) as order_amount,r.audit_status,r.order_status,r.create_dt,r.receiver,r.mobile,r.area_name,r.detailed_address,r.reply_mobile,r.is_end,r.remark,r.source,r.freight,r.rx_img_url,g.abbreviation_picture,g.spec FROM rx_t_reserve_order r LEFT JOIN t_member m on r.member_id=m.id LEFT JOIN t_goods g on r.goodid=g.id where 1=1 and r.id=$id$
